sentences.en: Dov 'è la Permate auto bus per piazza San Pietro?
sentences.cn: 请问开往圣?彼得广场的汽车站在那儿?

sentences.en: From Piazza Navona , we were heading to Piazza Spagna.
sentences.cn: 我们从拉沃纳广场,往西班牙广场的方向前进.

sentences.en: I have cleared my piazza of that unsavory flytrap.
sentences.cn: 我除掉了走廊上这只臭不可闻的捕蝇器啦.

sentences.en: Not so far away from the Piazza Spagna, there is Piazza Popolo.
sentences.cn: 距离西班牙广场不远处就是这波波洛广场了.

sentences.en: Piazza is Catholic and is featured in the Catholic film series Champions of Faith.
sentences.cn: Piazza是 一明天主教徒,并曾经在天主教电影ChampionsofFaith中演出.

sentences.en: Piazza is pressing charges against Flores.
Piazza was the last player the Dodgers drafted in the 1988 draft.
sentences.cn: Piazza是1988年最后一位被道奇选进的球员.

sentences.en: Piazza would later catch for Roger Clemens in the 2004 All - Star Game.
Siena's main piazza was one of the sights of Italy.
sentences.cn: 锡耶纳的主要广场是意大利的名胜之一.

sentences.en: The church is a short walk from Piazza Dante.
sentences.cn: 教堂离但丁广场只有几步之遥。

sentences.en: There was the favourite rigoletto, or round dance, footed " in piazza " under the blue frosty sky.
sentences.cn: 有大家喜欢的里戈莱托, 或者叫做圈舞, 于雾蒙蒙的蓝天下 “ 在广场上 ” 跳了起来.

sentences.en: They kept to the sides of the street as they walked toward the piazza.
sentences.cn: 他们紧贴街道两旁,向广场进发.

sentences.en: They walked out of the cafeteria, and across the piazza.
sentences.cn: 他们走出自助餐厅, 穿过广场.

sentences.en: They went to the piazza, where the crowd was rather less riotous than before.
sentences.cn: 他们到了广场, 广场的人群不再象以前那样奔放不羁了.

sentences.en: Turn south at Mulinello to reach Piazza Armerina.
sentences.cn: 在穆利内洛转向南，去往皮亚扎—阿尔梅里纳。

trans.tran_cn: 广场，市场，走廊，游廊，<英>连拱廊
trans.tran_en: a large square open area between the houses in a town or city, where people often meet or sit together
